{{Wireless embedded system |brand=nVIDIA |model=Shield TV |revision=Darcy (P2897) |asin=B01N1NT9Y6 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=Android media player, media streamer, game console, |fcc_date=08/29/2016 |fcc_id=VOB-P2897, VOB-P2571, VOB-P2920 |ic_id=7361A-P2897 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.1 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=nVIDIA |cpu1_model=Tegra X1 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN9DW4-16G |fla1_num= |ram1=3 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, HDMI, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_hdmi_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4354 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8111GS |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI 2.0b, Bluetooth 4.1, DFS (slave), fan, |stock_os=Android TV;8.0;Oreo; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|SHIELD Android TV Game Console}} :[https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/shield/specs/ Product page] (2017){{•}}[https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/shield/shield-tv/ Product page] (2019)
*'''NVIDIA Shield TV''' (2017) - 16Gb (eMMC), USB, No MicroSD Card slot, :No Infrared control; Remote: Coin cell battery, No headphone jack *'''NVIDIA Shield TV Pro''' (2017) - 500GB HDD (int.), [https://www.androidcentral.com/nvidia-shield-pro-vs-standard-which-should-i-buy MicroSD Card slot], :Micro USB port; Remote: Rechargeable battery, Headphone jack
===Models=== :;[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/streaming-gaming/nvidia-shield-tv NVIDIA Shield Android TV Game Console] (2015/2017) • [https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/shield/previous-generation/ Products] *[[NVIDIA Shield (P2571)]] - ''Foster'' (2015) • [https://www.wi-fi.org/product-finder-results?keywords=P2571 WFA59352] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VOB-P2571 VOB-P2571] (2015-03-12) • Android 7.0 :CPU: Tegra X1 (T210); WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4354 *[[NVIDIA Shield (P2897)]] - ''Darcy'' (2017) • [https://www.wi-fi.org/product-finder-results?keywords=P2897 WFA66734] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VOB-P2897 VOB-P2897] (2016-08-29) • Android 8.0 :CPU: Tegra X1 (T210); WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4354 *[[NVIDIA Shield (P3430)]] - ''[https://www.xda-developers.com/nvidia-shield-tv-2019-rumors/ Sif]'' (2019) • [https://www.wi-fi.org/product-finder-results?keywords=P3430 WFA91178] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VOB-P3430 VOB-P3430] (2019-07-25) • Android 9.0 :CPU: Tegra X1+ ([https://www.xda-developers.com/nvidia-shield-tv-2019-rumors/ T210B01]); WLAN: [[Cypress]] [https://www.androidheadlines.com/2019/07/nvidia-shield-android-tv-wi-fi-bluetooth.html CYW4356]
===Specifications=== :;NVIDIA Shield TV ''Darcy'' (2017) *Model: P2897 *SoC: ''[[NVIDIA]]'' Tegra X1 @2.0GHz armv8l (Quad Core) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 + 4x ARM Cortex-A53 (64-bit) :GPU: ''GeForce'' 6 ULP (GM204) @1.0GHz (256-cores) *Flash: 16GB (eMMC), RAM: 3GB (DDR3) *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz 2x2) *Ethernet: 1x GbE port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.1 *A/V Out: HDMI 2.0b (4K HDR, 1080p) :3840x2160 @60Hz, Rec.2020, HDCP 2.2 *Remote: Bluetooth, IR, Microphone *Gamepad: ''NVIDIA Shield Controller'' *OS: Android TV 7.0 (Nougat) :SHIELD Experience 6.2 *Power: DC 19V/2.1A (1.8m)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.ixbt.com/live/kyrie1965/nvidia-shield-tv---bezzhalostnyy-palach-rynka-android-boksov.html ''NVIDIA Shield TV'' on '''iXBT'''] *[https://www.ixbt.com/multimedia/nvidia-shield-tv-2017.shtml ''NVIDIA Shield TV 2017'' on '''iXBT''']
===See also=== *[[NVIDIA Shield TV]] {{WPLink|Shield_Android_TV}} :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VOB VOB]-P2571, -P2897, -P3430 *[[NVIDIA Shield Portable]] {{WPLink|Shield_Portable}} :FCC ID: VOB-P2523 (2016-07-15) *[[NVIDIA Shield Tablet]] {{WPLink|Shield_Tablet}} :FCC ID: VOB-P2290W (2016-08-11)
